title: Ijiwaru na Tsukai no Netsu ni Oborete
description: After being abandoned by his influential family for being (Ω), Kisaragi Akito sells his body for living …On his way after work he got kidnapped by some masked men only to be sold at some underground auction. Asahina Reiji aka "the ruthless prince," of the Asahina group brought him for 3 billion. Akito who thought that he will be treated as a slave and plaything gets shocked when Reiji asked him to bear his child?! Akito who has experience a lot didn't think much before accepting the offer. Akito who always hated the omega heat ends up yearning for it while being embraced by Reiji.
